text:
viSva# Enaqmanu# madantu dEqvAH || 
aqmuqtraqBUyAqdadhaq yadyaqmasyaq bRuha#spatE aqBiSa#stEqra mu#~jcaH | 
pratyau#hatA-maqSvinA# mRuqtyuma#smAd dEqvAnA#-magnE BiqShajAq SacI#BiH || 
udvaqyaM tama#saqspariq paSya#ntOq jyOtiqrutta#raM | 
dEqvaM dE#vaqtrA sUryaqmaga#nmaq jyOti#ruttaqmaM || 28
(iqmE SiqvO aqgnE - &tiq - sauBa#gAyaq - catu#stri(gm)Sacca) (A7)
